user.title: Cloudflare API Token
user.description: Enter your Cloudflare API token. This token must have permissions to list accounts, list AI models, and run AI completions. Recommended: Use a token with the 'Account:Read', 'Workers AI:Read', and 'Workers AI:Edit' permissions for your account. You can create a token at {token_doc_url}. The token will be validated before you can continue.

account.title: Select Cloudflare Account
account.description: Choose the Cloudflare account to use for AI completions.

model.description: Pick a model to use. See supported models at {model_doc_url} and model pricing at {pricing_doc_url}.
